text: Keayodendron is a genus of plants in the family Phyllanthaceae first described as a genus in 1959.Leandri, Jacques Désiré. 1959. Bulletin de la Société Botanique de France 105: 517Tropicos, Keayodendron Leandri It contains only one known species, Keayodendron bridelioides, native to tropical western and Central Africa (Ghana, Cote d’Ivoire, Nigeria, Cameroon, Gabon, the Republic of the Congo, and the Central African Republic).Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== Category:Phyllanthaceae Category:Phyllanthaceae genera Category:Monotypic Malpighiales genera
title: Keayodendron
